cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.0.0)

set(CMAKE_TOOLCHAIN_FILE "$ENV{VCPKG_ROOT}/scripts/buildsystems/vcpkg.cmake")

project(main)
file(GLOB_RECURSE fileCollection "src/*.cpp")
add_executable(main ${fileCollection})

include_directories("$ENV{VULKAN_SDK}/include")

# Libraries
# ===========================================================
# Insert sentences here generated by vcpkg after installation
# ===========================================================
find_package(SDL2 CONFIG REQUIRED)
target_link_libraries(main PRIVATE SDL2::SDL2 SDL2::SDL2main SDL2::SDL2-static)

find_package(glm CONFIG REQUIRED)
target_link_libraries(main PRIVATE glm::glm)

find_package(glfw3 CONFIG REQUIRED)
target_link_libraries(main PRIVATE glfw)
